DOC.brief_summary: Vitamin D deficiency accelerate vascular risk progression kidney transplant .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Replacement After Kidney Transplant
DOC.detailed_description: This trial ass follow aim : 1 . Time plateau vitamin D concentration initiate vitamin D supplement 2 . Safety vitamin D replacement base serum urine calcium 3 . Effect vitamin D PTH concentration individual elevate parathyroid hormone 4 . Effect vitamin D marker insulin resistance inflammation
DOC.criteria: Kidney transplant 6 month ago 19 year old 25OH vitamin D ≤30 ng/ml Estimated GFR < 30 ml/min/1.73m² Previous small bowel lung transplant Pancreas transplant le 6 month ago Cancer condition would change weight dramatically near future malabsorption Willing return test every two month Women pregnant < 6 week postpartum Calcium > 10.5 mg/dl Phosphate > 4.8 mg/dl Taking 10,000 I.U . vitamin D per week Drinking 2 alcohol drink day 14 drink per week History parathyroid surgery Known granulomatous disease Magnesium < 1.6 mg/dL Taking seizure medication affect vitamin D Taking zempler ® and/or Rocaltrol ® History kidney stone Not stable dose bisphosphonate past three month Planning pancreas transplant within next year In research study
